articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Africa: No need for mass monkeypox immunisation – experts - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The African continent has not recently recorded any confirmed or suspected cases of monkeypox, unlike Europe and the US.
articles.content:
South African disease experts have said that they did not see a need for a mass vaccination campaign against monkeypox or believe that cases would explode in the same way as COVID-19.
